amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove restrictions on Federal funding for human embryo research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of July 9, 1996, to delete the provisions in the bill which prohibit any funds appropriated in the bill to be used for human embryo research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowey amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 256 (Roll no. 307).
